name: Bird-Boy
description:
Bird-Boy

Bird-Boy tells the story of a young kid who finds a bird nest in his attic. He'll then help the bird find his lost eggs trought a 4 level adventure learning various abilities along the way such as gliding, double jumping and much more!

  Retro Style

The game has been made to run on an original Game Boy / Game Boy Color Cartrdige. With every limitations in mind from limited tilesets, color palettes, and sprites.

  Controls ActionsGame BoyKeyboardMovingD-PadArrowsJumpingAJClimbingUpUpGlidingBKDouble JumpingA + AJ + JLevel SelectSelectShiftStatsStartEnter
  How to play

Bird-Boy can be played on original hardware using a cartridge.
But due to its limited controls, it's perfectly suitable for keyboards and phones using keys or a touch screen.
